name: 1st Project
description: This was my First Project ever, I did it months after my first year at University, So I wanted to test my knowledge and learn some things.

name: Food Project
description: This was my Second project. I made it because my mother was giving me recipes and I decided to added it on a website created by me. Soon this website will be changed, it will be remade to backend and will be hosted by a server and database with crud functionalities included.
somethingElse: Soon will be: NodeJs, Express, HandleBars, MongoDB, Passport

name: Survivor
description: This was my First Project at Ironhack. As you can see it's a game done with Canvas. I decided to do it because I always loved fps games, mostly shooting games so it reminds me those times that I used to play.

name: 4Lolz
description: This was my Second Project at Ironhack. It's a website where you can share funny posts about programming languages. There's also login with google and share on facebook. Hope you have fun watching it and relate to them.
languages: NodeJs, Express, HandleBars, Passport, MongoDB, Passport, Cloudinary, Bcrypt
somethingElse: BackEnd application. I did together with 2 Friends.

name: Simplify.
description: This was my Third Project at Ironhack.  This platform has monthly subscriptions where we offer Services to our memberships.
somethingElse: This is a MERN Application made by me and one friend.

name: Portfolio
